name: CICD | FUNC | (MS Teams) Collect Basic Information
description: When there is a new command to Slack Workbot, do action and other actions

code.name: execute

input.sample_document:
{
	"project_config_id": "sample project config id",
    "deployment_mode": "rlcm",
	"source_environment": "TEST",
	"source_code_repo": "source code repo",
	"source_code_reviewer": "reviewer uname",
	"reviewer_msteams": "msteams user",
	"release_announcement": "announcement channel",
  	"project_name": "project name",
	"manifest_id": "132432",
	"project_dependencies": "9b592f7a-b752-4fac-b38e-e0a64c3832c2,96103bce-7fcf-459f-80b6-b0c4c610daab",
	"target_env_folder_1": "1111",
    "target_env_1": "DEV",
    "target_env_folder_2": "2222",
    "target_env_2": "TEST"
}

block.name: search_entries
block.description: Search entries in CICD | LT | Project Configuration lookup table

extended_input_schema.hint: Provide one or more entry fields to search the entry
extended_input_schema.label: Search by
extended_input_schema.name: parameters

block.name: call_recipe
block.description: Call CICD | FUNC | Fetch User Channels

input.code:
user_array = input['user_array']
channel_array = input['channel_array']

merged_list = user_array + channel_array

{ output: merged_list }
input.name: Merge Lists

choice_set_input.label: Environment
choice_set_input.hint: Select the source environment of the package.

text_block.text: **NOTE**: Applicable only for "Projects (Environments)". Please select the correct "dev" source environment from above, which is the only supported type.

text_input.label: PM Project Key
text_input.hint: Please enter the project key from project management tool.

text_input.label: Source Code Repository
text_input.hint: Source code repository to be used for creating release.

text_input.label: Reviewer username
text_input.hint: Pull request reviewer, it should be a valid username.

choice_set_input.label: Reviewer (MS Teams)
choice_set_input.hint: Reviewer MS Teams ID for notification.
Please enter a channel to announce releases
choice_set_input.label: Release Announcement

action_submit.title: Next
action_submit.params: command: manage_project_config param1: configure_project project_config_id: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"json_parser","line":"49ec6bf5","path":["document","project_config_id"]}')} replace_message: true

code.comment: Define how users should command Workbot from Slack
